thread.title: Smokey And The Bandit Easter Egg In The Walking Dead
thread.title_full: Smokey And The Bandit Easter Egg In The Walking Dead

author: Brandon Davis
title: Smokey And The Bandit Easter Egg In The Walking Dead
text:
Smokey And The Bandit Easter Egg In The Walking Dead Brandon Davis 02/19/2017 
Spoilers for The Walking Dead Season 7 Episode 10 follow. 
Sunday night's episode of The Walking Dead came with an Easter Egg reference to Smokey and The Bandit . 
As Daryl and Richard hid from the Saviors, ultimately coming to blows over their opposing views of Carol's importance, they were ducking behind a truck. The truck seen in the moment featured in the New Best Friends episode of the AMC series was a truck seen in the popular film Smokey and The Bandit . 
See a photo of the truck in the tweet below. â€” Ben Corrado (@BigBlue4X) February 20, 2017 
The Walking Dead often pays homage to horror films. An action adventure film is new, though. Now, if we can just get a Burt Reynolds zombie, the homage will really be complete. MORE THE WALKING DEAD: 
The Walking Dead airs Sundays at 9 pm ET on AMC . For complete coverage and insider info all season long, follow @BrandonDavisBD on Twitter. The Walking Dead Sunday at 9PM EST on AMC ComicBook Composite 86.60 #7 All-Time Comic TV Shows Average rating
